places_with_reviews.name: Durga Mandir (Rohari)
places_with_reviews.address: FJJ8+97P, Rohri Rd, Maheshkhunt, Banni, Bihar 851214, India

reviews.text: Very nice place for worship and it has a big ground
Old and famous Durga mandir surrounded by small shop mostly sweet, kirana & vegetable .
This is very beautiful goddess durga's temple and it is very nice and I love it very much.

One of the oldest devi durga temple of maheshkhunt thats located in ramchandrapur village.
At the time of morning puja during Navratri or Navami, You'll find this place very much cool as this place is crowd free.

This temple is built by the contribution of ramchandarpur villagers, they don't take donation to build temple from people outside of village.
Very good village and Durga mandir

places_with_reviews.name: Shiv Mandir Chandi Tola Banni
places_with_reviews.address: chandi tola, FJP4+M97, Banni, Bihar 851213, India

reviews.text:
Best temple in banni area.
There's a lot of fun to have and Play in near Cricket stadium
A most religious place which called shiv temple. Every year mahashivratri fair are organised here
Shib ratri me yaha shiv ki ahu bari puja and mela lagta in indian culture
Akhilesh Kumar sivmandir chandi tola banni ka very God
Good spritual place in Khagaria region ..

places_with_reviews.name: Durga Mandir Thatha
places_with_reviews.address: Thatha, FHWR+RP6, Mansi, Paschimi Thatha, Bihar 851214, India

reviews.text: This temple is very beautiful and it is a Hindu temple and considering the culture there is a lot of space to sit and there is also a game on it.
Purvi Thatha one of the best football ground and having Goddess Durga Temple.
A most religious place which called mata durga tample near railway line
We are to go this place feeling happy and peaceful !!!

places_with_reviews.name: Markaji Masjid
places_with_reviews.address: FJ7F+9J2, Salimnagar, Maheshkhunt, Shamshuddinpur, Bihar 851213, India

reviews.text: Very  peace  and  lovable palace  of  salimnagar  village
Loved this place,,,go here sit for some time,,and fell the peace,,, fabulous

Manmohak place
I heard the aarti here in evening and my    heart is full of joy...............
My homely temple I reguraler pray the god

Shiv mandir commonly called shivalaya in naya nagar banni.  the Shiv parvthi temple remains an active site of worship and doesn't need any ticket.
As you can see the attached picture, it has half feet height Lingam and as per Pujari Ji ,same height of half part is below the visible base.

There used to be an evening Aarti just below the temple which is best part.

Dont expect same level of architecture as other temples in western group of temple has.
